title: feeling sound
author: feeling sound
content: Unfortunately,I join the crypto community at the beginning of the end of the last bull run. I invested heavily quickly and I watched my portfolio dwindle down to the ranges we see today.I don't regret what I did because it taught me a lot of valuable lessons along the way. I never sold and continued to invest , I now focus on DCA every month.All this is to say;I haven't yet had the opportunity to experience a bull run. I understand form my countless hours researching the space that even I'm 'early considering that the next bull run will likely arrive alongside regulation, then institutional  invest and mass adoption. Realistically, what will the next bull run look like?Thank you"

comments.author: kaseygriffin
comments.body: Quote from: feeling sound on July 31, 2022, 01:36:16 AMUnfortunately,I join the crypto community at the beginning of the end of the last bull run. I invested heavily quickly and I watched my portfolio dwindle down to the ranges we see today.I don't regret what I did because it taught me a lot of valuable lessons along the way. I never sold and continued to invest , I now focus on DCA every month.All this is to say;I haven't yet had the opportunity to experience a bull run. I understand form my countless hours researching the space that even I'm 'early considering that the next bull run will likely arrive alongside regulation, then institutional  invest and mass adoption. Realistically, what will the next bull run look like?Thank you" You can have faith in them, but you also need to balance between the benefits and risks you will receive. The past mistakes should be considered as a lesson that you need to work hard to overcome. It's better for yourself to stay positive about the market like that. Just as a guess, hold on for the long term and learn more. Don't just appear when benefiting and having happiness doesn't maintain success and sustainable investment is created.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: For me every bull run surpass its previous run so this next bull run might be an epic moment again. We all knew that since we experience past bull run in sequence. Most people dont believe this will be huge cause its really massive movement but history repeat itself apparently weve just enter a consolidation stage and that bull run can happen 2 to 3 years from now. Whay you are doing is good cause it can change your lives by doing dca and sell it on a high phase bull run.

comments.author: CryptoBuds
comments.body: Bull seasons are always full of surprises and the next bull season will always be more epic than the previous one, that's my feeling. You are unlucky when you hold everything high, but you are not failing as long as you hold bitcoin and have not sold any of them. what you are doing is right, DCA when you can and just hold on till next bull season you will have success which I am sure will be bigger than what you expected.

comments.author: Tamedbeast
comments.body: The game is still on for you OP, you only lose if you sell so hold your coins and tokens for the long term and keep a closer watch on all the projects you have because many projects always get relinquished in every bear market for different reasons.

comments.author: fuguebtc
comments.body: It depends entirely on you.If you are buying and DCA continuously throughout the bear season and holding when the bull season comes, it will be a great feeling because you will get the reward you deserve.On the other hand, if you do not make any buy during the bear season, when the bull season arrives, you will feel disappointed and regret that you did not have any confidence in the bear season.

comments.author: X-ray
comments.body: The next bullrun must be the bitcoin will be reaching another new ATH. You must have seen the old chart of bitcoin when it was going from nothing to the more than 60k. If bitcoin will be able doing it and then whole of market will be giving the same reaction. You will be seeing so many tokens in your portfolios will be going up. You will earn bunch of money if you have bought at the bottom. So many people are in big euphoria during the bullish season. This is what will be happening during the bullish season.

comments.author: Ulven
comments.body: Quote from: feeling sound on July 31, 2022, 01:36:16 AMRealistically, what will the next bull run look like?Thank you" I don't think we can tell if we will see an upward race in the coming periods, but it remains only a future forecast, given the cryptocurrency price path is volatile and risky.We have heard previously that many sold the property and invested in Bitcoin, but they suffered a loss, so it is advised to invest what can be accepted for loss.

comments.author: Morningstarr
comments.body: Quote from: feeling sound on July 31, 2022, 01:36:16 AMAll this is to say;I haven't yet had the opportunity to experience a bull run. I understand form my countless hours researching the space that even I'm 'early considering that the next bull run will likely arrive alongside regulation, then institutional  invest and mass adoption. Realistically, what will the next bull run look like?Thank you" Bitcoin started to fall at a time when the Russia-Ukraine war shocked the global economy.Due to this bitcoin lost its value very fast and many projects were also dead but now we are seeing the situation improving, The market is also improving, so the hope is that this time we saw a great bull run.

comments.author: rugrats
comments.body: Quote from: Morningstarr on July 31, 2022, 03:53:29 PMQuote from: feeling sound on July 31, 2022, 01:36:16 AMAll this is to say;I haven't yet had the opportunity to experience a bull run. I understand form my countless hours researching the space that even I'm 'early considering that the next bull run will likely arrive alongside regulation, then institutional  invest and mass adoption. Realistically, what will the next bull run look like?Thank you" Bitcoin started to fall at a time when the Russia-Ukraine war shocked the global economy.Due to this bitcoin lost its value very fast and many projects were also dead but now we are seeing the situation improving, The market is also improving, so the hope is that this time we saw a great bull run.Don't get too excited and hopeful, we've lost over 70% from ATH and we're only up 5-10% so there's no guarantee that bear season is over. You say war causes shock to the global economy and bitcoin is its victim too and the war shows no sign of ending, it's hard to see a better market than now. Everything is just a price trap so be careful.

comments.author: Jackl87
comments.body: Quote from: feeling sound on July 31, 2022, 01:36:16 AMUnfortunately,I join the crypto community at the beginning of the end of the last bull run. I invested heavily quickly and I watched my portfolio dwindle down to the ranges we see today.I don't regret what I did because it taught me a lot of valuable lessons along the way. I never sold and continued to invest , I now focus on DCA every month.Realistically, what will the next bull run look like?First of all i think it is great that you apparently followed one of the most important advices if not the single most important advice if you are planning to invest into the crypto market: Never invest more, than you can afford to lose. If this would not be the case then you would now be full of regrets and maybe you even had to sell now with a big loss. Even though you are now probably very deep in the negative numbers in terms of profit that does not mean anything because the loss only becomes real once you have sold.Regarding what the next bullrun looks like? No one really knows i guess. So far i experienced the bullrun of 2018 and the one of 2020 to 2021 and i would say both of them were very different, so i would guess that maybe the next bullrun will start also out of the blue and will not behave like the last ones.

comments.author: batang_bitcoin
comments.body: Quote from: feeling sound on July 31, 2022, 01:36:16 AMRealistically, what will the next bull run look like?We don't know how it will look like until we're finally seeing it. To be honest, the last bull run, I'm sure that many didn't expected it to be like that. It was like more than times three of 2017 bull run and that's quite a lot to be seen.Maybe by the next bull run, it will be more than that. Just don't expect a lot and as you hold, despite seeing those losses, you only lose until you sell.

comments.author: JoyMarsha
comments.body: No loss is done if you refuse to sell your bitcoin. Having your assets stored in bitcoin means there is hope for you to make profits in the future.Anticipating for the next bull run will be a massive break in bitcoin price. Just have fate and be patient enough to trust the movement. Your portfolio will smile back.The bullrun happens once in 4years, during that period bitcoin do skyrocket to a new ATH giving us a new record of price movements to talk about as time persists

comments.author: strunberg
comments.body: Quote from: feeling sound on July 31, 2022, 01:36:16 AMUnfortunately,I join the crypto community at the beginning of the end of the last bull run. I invested heavily quickly and I watched my portfolio dwindle down to the ranges we see today.I don't regret what I did because it taught me a lot of valuable lessons along the way. I never sold and continued to invest , I now focus on DCA every month.in every loss we could took important lesson to improve our knowledge, we will know how to hold our self and didnt fell fomo when looking all crypto price rising. this is happen to most investors , miss the train be main problem for them, personally better to miss the opportunity rather than miss my money.Quote from: feeling sound on July 31, 2022, 01:36:16 AMAll this is to say;I haven't yet had the opportunity to experience a bull run. I understand form my countless hours researching the space that even I'm 'early considering that the next bull run will likely arrive alongside regulation, then institutional  invest and mass adoption. Realistically, what will the next bull run look like?Thank you" next bull run wil be greater than before, institution and also whales will accumulate their crypto assets more than before due some reason. believe we will see crazier movement especially at altcoin.

comments.author: inanilujimi
comments.body: What I know is that in 2017 when the bullrun started with many FUDs such as China banning all forms of crypto activity, in 2021 there was a pandemic due to covid 19 which resulted in almost all countries implementing a lockdown, and for the next few years, I assume maybe after the war and inflation in interest rates stabilizes there will be momentum for the crypto market to rise to become even stronger.

comments.author: bittick
comments.body: Bullrun was about so many coins in the market jumped so high and people in a very big trend to believe if the market will create another record in the future. It's about selling your portfolios at the peak price while the bearish trend already wiped out from the market. You must also aware that if these days people are always expecting bullrun for long term.

comments.author: fuer44
comments.body: this week is very surprising, the altcoins I hold are dropping drastically. last week nominex was still at $0.7 and now it has fallen again to $0.5. I don't want to sell and hold it anymore, I don't know how long this will end.whereas last year's nominex had reached $6.for the market as a whole I don't really see it because I'm more focused on the coins I'm holding at the moment, but I think things are pretty much the same.

comments.author: Tony116
comments.body: Every time there is a bull run, most bitcoin and potential coins will always hit a new ATH, so there will always be extreme excitement for holders at a highly discounted price and during the rising season there will be strong FOMO that makes the market sublimate and you will feel the market become much more vibrant and crowded. Most newbies will join when the bull market starts rather than in the bear market.

comments.author: asriloni
comments.body: The last bullrun has been pumping bitcoin from around 5k to the almost 70k. Can't you imagine how big the pump that happened with altcoin as well? The next bullrun may be even bigger than last bullrun. Expecting bitcoin supply will be less and less but this has a good impact to the price of bitcoin. That means possible thing for bitcoin to reach 100k in the next bullrun and you can imagine how much altcoins will worth during that time. It will be giving us golden opportunity to get rich

comments.author: Ahli38
comments.body: The bear market that was present this time was enough to frustrate many beginners. but believe me those who persevere and start re-strategizing and correcting past mistakes then he will be lucky when the bullrun market returns.however, the bullrun market cannot easily return to its presence in the midst of the economic crisis that has hit all countries in the world. the entire investment sector experienced a decline. But recently the market looks a bit positive. but I myself see that bitcoin could return to the resistance point in the area around 25k - 26k. but after that it looks like the bear market will return. and it will take some more time to get to the long bullrun market. so your decision to focus on DCA is the right thing. because the current market situation can only be maximized with the DCA technique. buy incrementally and sell incrementally. no need to rush and don't be afraid we will be left behind in taking the bottom price. be patient and do the analysis calmly. DYOR.
